pages.text: Uses RF to mine stone- and dirt-type blocks efficiently. It can be charged and augmented in the Tinker's Workbench. A reinforced or higher integral component is needed to mine obsidian. After installing radius augments, press '$(k:cofh.mode_change_increment)' to change between mining radii. It can be enchanted with $(l:thermal:world/holding)Holding$(/l) to improve RF capacity.
